location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Digges LaTouche and George Abraham, Council at Bussora (Basra) from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter reports arrival of Captain John Wicks from Bombay and states that the Betsey SnowCaptain David Phillips has been in sight of Bushire for two days but unable to land at the port due to strong North Westerns (winds). Shipped by Ibrahim Caracky.
